comment: Professor Sweeting means well, but this class is tough because he is super unclear on what he wants 9/10 times. He isn't a harsh grader which is nice, considering almost every assignment, my classmates and I were unsure of what he wanted and when he wanted it. He was a nice guy, but really confusing and I don't feel like I came out prepared.

This was Prof Sweeting's 1st time teaching, & the semester started out a little rough. He hasn't fully mastered the art of teaching yet, but he's not a harsh grader whatsoever. You MUST buy the textbook IMMEDIATELY when the semester starts b/c there are assignments due on the 2nd day of class. Reading the book is how you'll learn everything.
